description.name: 23pcs MagicCUP headlight restoration kit
description.long_desc:
MagicCUP 23-Piece Headlight Restoration Kit is a comprehensive tool designed for professional renovation and restoration of car headlights' clarity. The GEKO brand product effectively removes dullness, scratches, and discoloration from headlights, restoring their original transparency and improving the vehicle's aesthetics. MagicCUP is the perfect solution for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.


Kit Contents:



  • 2 pcs. P800 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P1000 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P1200 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P1500 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P2000 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P2500 Sanding Disc

  • 2 pcs. P3000 Sanding Disc

  • 1 pc. 100ml Headlight Restoration Fluid

  • 1 pc. Fluid Application Cup

  • 1 pc. Plastic Cup Lid

  • 2 pcs. Cup Seal Rings

  • 1 pc. 230V Power Supply

  • 1 pc. Velcro-Backed Polishing Pad

  • 1 pc. M10 Thread Adapter

  • 1 pc. Cup Lid with Flexible Hose


Product Features:



  • Professional headlight restoration

  • Complete polishing and fluid application kit

  • Multi-grit sanding discs with polishing pad

  • Easy handling with ergonomic MagicCUP design

  • High efficiency and long-lasting effect


Instructions for Use:


Step 1: Surface Preparation



  • Thoroughly wash and dry the headlights.

  • Protect the headlight edges with painter's tape to shield the paintwork.


Step 2: Headlight Sanding



  • Start with the lowest grit sanding disc (P800).

  • Attach the disc to the polishing pad and gently sand the entire headlight surface.

  • Gradually switch to higher grit discs (P1000, P1200, P1500, P2000, P2500, P3000), continuing the sanding process.


Step 3: Preparing the MagicCUP



  • Carefully pour approximately 100 ml of headlight restoration fluid into the electric heating MagicCUP.

  • Secure the chosen lid.


Step 4: Fluid Application



  • Plug the 230V power supply into the cup handle socket.

  • Turn on the power and wait 5 minutes before applying the restoration coating to the lamp surface.

  • Evenly distribute the vapor across the entire headlight surface.


Step 5: Finishing Process



  • Wait for the headlight to dry completely.

  • Remove the protective tape.


Safety Precautions:



  • Use in a well-ventilated area.

  • Avoid contact of the fluid with skin and eyes.

  • Keep out of reach of children.

  • Do not inhale vapors.

description.name: 22pcs headlight restoration kit
description.long_desc:
Are your car’s headlights dull, yellowed, or scratched? With the Geko headlight restoration kit, you can restore their shine and clarity right in your garage! This complete set includes everything you need to clean, polish, and protect your headlights step by step, delivering professional results without an expensive visit to the workshop.



  • Complete restoration: Removes dullness, scratches, and yellowing, restoring headlight clarity.

  • Long-lasting protection: The protective liquid shields against UV rays and plastic aging.

  • DIY process: A simple step-by-step procedure eliminates the need for a workshop visit.

  • Versatile application: The kit is suitable for plastic headlights on most vehicles.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Sanding papers for headlight sanding:

    • 2 x P800, 2 x P1000, 2 x P1200, 2 x P1500, 2 x P2000, 2 x P2500, 2 x P3000
      The range of grit sizes allows precise removal of contaminants, yellowing, and micro-scratches.



  • Polishing sponge: Restores perfect clarity.

  • Masking tape (3 m x 1.5 cm): Protects paintwork around the headlight during the process.

  • Hook and loop polishing pad: Ensures easy attachment to the adapter.

  • Adapter with M10 thread: Compatible with most drills and polishers.

  • Microfiber cloth: For application and finishing touches.

  • Polishing paste (85 g): A key component of the polishing process.

  • 2 x 3 ml protective liquid: For long-lasting protection against UV rays and corrosion.


How to restore headlights step by step:


1. Sanding
Wet the sanding paper and attach it to the polishing pad. Sand the headlight surface starting with the coarsest grit (P800) and gradually moving to finer grits (P1200 -> P2000). This step is crucial to completely remove yellowing, fading, and corrosion.
Note: Use sanding papers in order from coarse to fine. Skipping this step can lead to restoration failure.


2. Polishing
Attach the polishing sponge to the pad and apply the polishing paste. Polish the headlight until it regains its original shine and clarity.
Note: For the best results, use an electric buffer or polisher. If polishing by hand, perform at least 200 circular strokes clockwise.


3. Protection
Clean the headlight and ensure it is dry before applying the protective liquid. Work in the shade, away from direct sunlight. Apply 5-10 drops of the protective liquid to the microfiber cloth and spread it evenly on the headlight using alternating horizontal and vertical strokes. Let it sit for 3-5 minutes, then wipe off any excess liquid. Wait 24 hours for full curing or use a hairdryer for 1-2 minutes.

description.name: KN60 snow chains 3.5/12mm
description.long_desc:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN60


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.description:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN90


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.name: KN100 snow chains 3.5/12mm
description.long_desc:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN100


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.short_desc:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN110


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.description:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN120


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.long_desc:
Snow Chains for Cars


Technical Specifications:


Size: KN140


Certificates / Standards: TUV/GS, ONORM V5117, EN 16662-1


Chain Link Height: 12 mm


Link Width: 3.5 mm


Link Cross-Section: Square


Set: For one axle (2 wheels)


Excellent Traction and Safety on Winter Roads


Invest in safe driving during winter conditions with our snow chains. Whether you’re heading to the mountains or just need to commute to work in challenging weather, our snow chains will provide you with confidence and security on any road.


High-Quality Steel Links


Our snow chains are made from premium-quality steel, ensuring exceptional durability and strength. Each link measures 12 mm in height and 3.5 mm in thickness, guaranteeing excellent resistance to wear and optimal durability when driving in tough winter conditions.


Maximum Traction with Square Links


The snow chains feature square cross-section links, significantly improving traction on icy and snowy surfaces. The square shape increases the contact area with the ground, resulting in better vehicle control and safety when driving in extreme conditions.


Complete Set for One Axle


We offer a complete set of chains for one axle, which includes two chains for installation on two wheels. This ensures safety for you and your passengers on winter roads.


Why Choose Our Snow Chains?



  • High-quality steel: durability and resistance to damage.

  • Square links: improved traction and vehicle control.

  • Link thickness and height: optimal wear resistance.

  • Complete set for one axle: everything you need for safe winter driving.

description.name: Thermal foldable picnic basket 30L
description.long_desc:
Introducing our reliable companion for your outdoor adventures – the 30-liter collapsible thermal picnic basket. Made from high-quality materials, this versatile basket features an interior lined with a thermal insulation mat to keep your food and drinks at the perfect temperature. Its innovative collapsible design ensures easy storage and transport, while the comfortable foam-padded handle makes carrying a loaded basket convenient. Whether you're heading for a picnic in the park or embarking on a road trip, our thermal basket is a dependable partner for any occasion.


Product Features:



  • 30L picnic basket

  • Made from durable 600D OXFORD material

  • Aluminum frame

  • Collapsible design for easy storage

  • Interior lined with a thermal insulation mat

  • Basket dimensions: 45x27x22 cm, with a zipper closure

description.name: Insulated beach blanket 200x200 (gray&blue)
description.long_desc:
The Perfect Blanket/Mat for Every Picnic - 2x2m


Ensure your comfort during outdoor relaxation! The Keltin Picnic Mat is the perfect solution for picnics, beach outings, or camping trips. Made from high-quality polyester, with an EPE foam layer and an aluminum foil backing, this mat provides excellent protection against moisture. Enjoy your picnic on wet grass or damp sand without worrying about getting your clothes wet or dirty.


Easy to Clean
The Keltin mat is not only water-resistant but also resistant to heavy soiling. This makes it exceptionally easy to maintain – simply wipe it with a damp cloth, and if needed, it can also be machine washed at a low temperature.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Top Material: 100% Polyester

  • Bottom Material: Aluminum Foil

  • Filling: EPE Foam

  • Dimensions: 200 x 200 cm

  • Weight: 1 kg

  • Additional Features: Practical carrying handle, secured with a Velcro strap

  • Color: Shades of gray with blue accents

description.name: ModernGREY safety shoes S1 SRC – size 39
description.long_desc:
Sportowe Buty Robocze Geko - Połączenie Stylu i Bezpieczeństwa

Prezentujemy sportowe buty robocze Geko, które łączą w sobie najwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa z nowoczesnym, stylowym designem. To idealne rozwiązanie dla osób ceniących sobie komfort oraz ochronę w pracy.

Kluczowe Cechy Produktu:

  • Podeszwa z tworzywa EVA: Gwarantuje lekkość oraz doskonałą amortyzację, zapewniając komfort noszenia przez cały dzień.

  • Podszewka z siatki oraz włókniny: Dba o odpowiednią wentylację, co zapobiega przegrzewaniu się stóp nawet podczas intensywnej pracy.

  • Kategoria ochrony S1: stalowy podnosek o odporności na uderzenia o sile 200J, zabudowana pięta, odporność na oleje, benzynę i inne rozpuszczalniki organiczne, właściwości antyelektrostatyczne, absorpcja energii w części piętowej

  • SRC - odporność na poślizg:

    • Na podłożu ceramicznym pokrytym laurylosiarczanu sodu (SLS): Zapewnia doskonałą przyczepność nawet na śliskich powierzchniach.

    • Na podłożu ze stali pokrytym glicerolem: Gwarantuje stabilność i bezpieczeństwo na trudnych nawierzchniach.

  • Stalowe podnoski: Chronią stopy przed uderzeniami o sile aż 200J, co znacznie zwiększa bezpieczeństwo w miejscu pracy.

  • Wytrzymałe oraz super lekkie: Idealne połączenie trwałości i komfortu, dzięki czemu buty doskonale sprawdzają się w wymagających warunkach.

  • Stylowy design: Nowoczesny wygląd, który pasuje nie tylko do roboczych, ale i codziennych stylizacji.

Te sportowe buty robocze są doskonałym wyborem dla profesjonalistów, którzy nie chcą rezygnować z komfortu ani stylu na rzecz bezpieczeństwa. Zainwestuj w swoje bezpieczeństwo i wygodę.

Rozmiary:

description.name: ModernGREY safety shoes S1 SRC – size 40
description.long_desc:
Geko Sports Safety Shoes - The Perfect Blend of Style and Safety


Introducing the Geko sports safety shoes, combining the highest safety standards with a modern, stylish design. These shoes are the ideal solution for those who value comfort and protection at work.



Key Product Features:




  • EVA Sole: Ensures lightness and excellent cushioning, providing all-day comfort.




  • Mesh and Fiber Lining: Provides proper ventilation, preventing foot overheating even during intense work.




  • S1 Protection Category: Steel toe cap with 200J impact resistance, enclosed heel, resistance to oils, gasoline, and other organic solvents, antistatic properties, and energy absorption in the heel area.




  • SRC - Slip Resistance:




    • On ceramic surfaces covered with sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS): Provides excellent grip even on slippery surfaces.




    • On steel surfaces covered with glycerol: Ensures stability and safety on difficult terrains.






  • Steel Toe Caps: Protect feet from impacts up to 200J, significantly enhancing workplace safety.




  • Durable and Super Lightweight: The perfect combination of durability and comfort, making the shoes ideal for demanding conditions.




  • Stylish Design: Modern look that fits both work and casual outfits.




These sports safety shoes are an excellent choice for professionals who do not want to sacrifice comfort or style for safety. Invest in your safety and comfort today.


Sizes:

  • Podszewka z siatki oraz włókniny: Dba o odpowiednią wentylację, co zapobiega przegrzewaniu się stóp nawet podczas intensywnej pracy.

  • Kategoria ochrony S1: stalowy podnosek o odporności na uderzenia o sile 200J, zabudowana pięta, odporność na oleje, benzynę i inne rozpuszczalniki organiczne, właściwości antyelektrostatyczne, absorpcja energii w części piętowej

  • SRC - odporność na poślizg:

    • Na podłożu ceramicznym pokrytym laurylosiarczanu sodu (SLS): Zapewnia doskonałą przyczepność nawet na śliskich powierzchniach.

    • Na podłożu ze stali pokrytym glicerolem: Gwarantuje stabilność i bezpieczeństwo na trudnych nawierzchniach.

  • Stalowe podnoski: Chronią stopy przed uderzeniami o sile aż 200J, co znacznie zwiększa bezpieczeństwo w miejscu pracy.

  • Wytrzymałe oraz super lekkie: Idealne połączenie trwałości i komfortu, dzięki czemu buty doskonale sprawdzają się w wymagających warunkach.

  • Stylowy design: Nowoczesny wygląd, który pasuje nie tylko do roboczych, ale i codziennych stylizacji.

Te sportowe buty robocze są doskonałym wyborem dla profesjonalistów, którzy nie chcą rezygnować z komfortu ani stylu na rzecz bezpieczeństwa. Zainwestuj w swoje bezpieczeństwo i wygodę.
